channel.title: Hi, I'm Ryan, product newbie
channel.description:
Hi everyone,
I've been a software developer for companies large and small (always an employee). I've gotten my first taste of my own product revenue with a small app, [Rotate Mailer ][1], and now I want more :)
Looking forward to learning from all of you.
Ryan
[1]: http://rotatemailer.com/ "Rotate Mailer"

item.title: Hi, I'm Ryan, product newbie

item.description:
